name: monaco-css
description: CSS, LESS and SCSS plugin for the Monaco Editor

scripts.prepublish: mrmdir ./release && npm run compile && node ./scripts/release.js && webpack --config webpack.dev.config.js && webpack --config webpack.min.config.js && mcopy ./src/monaco.d.ts ./release/monaco.d.ts
scripts.install-service-next: npm install vscode-css-languageservice@next -f -D && npm install vscode-languageserver-types@next -f -D

author: Microsoft Corporation
